resources.string: READY TO TRAIN YOUR BRAIN LIKE NEVER BEFORE ?
Perfect game to challenge your brain and have hours of fun!
You have to score 80% to earn coins
Share App with your Family & Friends
You will be asked a set number of questions based on your selected preferences.
You can attempt each question only once!
Each question have a time limit. Make sure to answer before time runs out.
‚Ä¢ Each correct answer gives you 1 point.\n‚Ä¢ No negative marking for wrong answers.
You must answer each question to proceed to the next one.
In Custom Quiz mode, you can choose from Easy, Medium, or Hard questions.
Your total score will be displayed at the end, along with the correct answers.
Don‚Äôt use external help ‚Äî test your own knowledge!
‚Ä¢ Score 80% or higher to earn coins.\n‚Ä¢ The more questions you attempt, the more coins you can earn.
This quiz is meant to be enjoyable ‚Äî relax and challenge yourself!

Effective Date: 31/07/2025 \nYour privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how Quizora (‚Äúwe‚Äù, ‚Äúour‚Äù, or ‚Äúus‚Äù) collects, uses, and protects your information when you use our app.
We do not collect, store, or share any personal or sensitive user data. The app is designed to function entirely offline or without requiring personal information from users.
Our app does not integrate with any third-party analytics, advertising, or data collection services.
The app is safe for all ages and does not collect any data from children or adults.
We may update this policy occasionally. Any changes will be posted in the app or GitHub repo.
Effective Date: 31/07/2025\nPlease read these Terms and Conditions (Terms) before using the Quizora app.
By using the app, you agree to be bound by these terms.

You must be at least 13 years old to use this app.\nYou agree not to misuse or exploit the app or its features (e.g., coin system, chatbot access).\nIn-app coins are virtual and have no real-world value.
The chatbot feature offers hints or answers in exchange for in-app coins.\nAccuracy is not guaranteed. Use it at your discretion.
All app content, designs, and code are property of Quizora and protected under copyright.
These Terms may change at any time. Continued use after changes means you accept them.
